name: Octave + MRST + DL con Conda separando libs
postCreateCommand:
sh -c '\
    curl -o- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nvm-sh/nvm/v0.40.3/install.sh | bash && \
    export NVM_DIR="$HOME/.nvm" && \
    . "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" && \
    nvm install 22 && \
    nvm use 22 && \
    npm install -g @smithery/cli @anthropic-ai/claude-code \
  '
